Namespace Fantas.Input

Classes

Button

Defines the buttons on gamepad.

ButtonEvent

Event when the GamePad button is pressed

ButtonValueChangedEvent

Event when a button with range (like Trigger) was changed

Controller

Controller represent one physical GamePad attached to the system

ControllerInput

ControllerInput is used to manage/get the connected game controllers

DragEvent

Drag Gesture (hold and move)

GestureCompleteEvent

When a gesture event is completed

GestureMagnifyEvent

Gesture on TouchPad

Key

Keyboard key codes

KeyboardInput

Keyboard Input class

KeyEvent

Key Up/Down event

MouseButtonEvent

Mouse event (button up, down, double-click, drag)

MouseInput

Mouse Input class

MouseMoveEvent

Mouse move event

MouseWheelEvent

Mouse wheel event

NodeMouseButtonEvent

Mouse event (button up, down, double-click, drag)

NodeMouseMoveEvent

Mouse move event

NodeTapEvent

Tap single time gesture over a note

PinchEvent

Pinch with two fingers (pinch/zoom)

SwipeDirection

Touch Swipe Direction

SwipeEvent

Swipe the finger quickly

TapEvent

Tap single time gesture

ThumbstickChangedEvent

Event when the GamePad thumbstick values was changed

TouchEvent

Simple Touch event

TouchInput

Touch Input (TouchScreen devices)
